result.execSummary: Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Order on Petition for Appointment of an Attorney
Order on Petition for Appointment of an Attorney
Status conference on December 22, 2022 at 11:30 am.

11:02 AM Defendant Benjamin Matthew Gahart appeared by phone.  Prosecuting attorney Aleksandra Hodowany in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant indicates still has not been appointed SPD. Court questions defendant in regards to previous attorneys. Court indicates JA Wiegand will try to locate court appointed attorney for defendant. Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for December 22, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Status conference on October 25, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Court removes Pretrial Release Monitoring Program:  Alcohol Monitoring -High level. All other conditions remain as previously set.
Court addresses bond modification request.  Defendant requests alcohol monitoring be removed, state has no objection. Court grants request, removes pre trial release monitoring.

10:30 AM Defendant Benjamin Matthew Gahart appeared by phone.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court questions where matter is at. Defendant indicates has not been appointed SPD yet. Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Request from the defendant to modify bond conditions.  Case listed on paperwork incorrect case number.  Request for this case.
Status conference on July 27, 2022 at 10:30 am.

10:20 AM Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Benjamin Matthew Gahart appeared by video. Court inquires if defendant has been appointed SPD yet.  Defendant indicates has not. Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for July 27, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 23, 2022 at 10:20 am.

Pretrial Release Monitoring Program: Must be enrolled and equipment activated prior to release. Alcohol Monitoring -High. No violent  contact direct or indirect with B.P. Maintain absolute sobriety. No presence in bars, taverns, liquor stores or any establishment whose primary purpose is the sale and/or consumption of alcohol except for employment purposes. Not to possess or consume any alcohol.
Amended to a signature bond.

Court addresses bond modification request. Defense requests cash bond be amended to signature bond.  State has no objection.  Court grants requests, amends bond to $2000 signature bond.  All other conditions remain as previously set.

10:02 AM Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Benjamin Matthew Gahart appeared by video from the Door County Jail.  Atty Viel appeared in Court.  Atty Viel indicates SPD has conflict, will attend this hearing as a friend of the court. Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel.  Defense requests bond modification.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 23, 2022 at 10:20 am.
Defendant Fingerprinted on 3/24/22.

1:00 PM Benjamin Gahart appeared via video from the Door County Jail, Colleen Nordin appeared in Court for the State of Wisconsin, Atty Shannon Viel appeared by phone for Benjamin Gahart.  State gives incident report, potential charges. Court questions Defendant on address/employment history, reviews right to Counsel. Court finds probable cause, sets bond. Return

Pretrial Release Monitoring Program: Must be enrolled and equipment activated prior to release. Alcohol Monitoring - High Monitoring.Maintain absolute sobriety. No violent contact direct or indirect with B.P.
